pages.text: By default, the $(2)Cube Mode$() sets the Projector to generate a force field in the shape of a cube that is exactly 1 block thick. Each $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() increases the size of the force field by 1 block in all directions.

pages.title: Field Adjustment
pages.text: The $(2)Cube Mode$() item can also be used to create cuboid (or right rectangular prism) shape force fields. Placing a $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() into an item slot marked by a directional arrow will scale the field by 1 block in only that direction. For example, to increase the height of a force field by 1 block; add a $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/scale_module)$(5)Scale Module$() into an item slot marked by a directional arrow pointing towards the top-left or top-right of the GUI screen.
